net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.data

Class SQLTableModelColumn

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.data.SQLTableModelColumn

  • public class SQLTableModelColumn
extends Object
    Defines a column for a SQLTableModel object.
    Author:
    Pat B. Double (double@i2rd.com)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected boolean canOrder
      Determines if ordering can (or should) be done for this column.
      protected SortOrder defaultOrder
      Determines the default ordering.
      protected String displayName
      The name of the column to display.
      protected String fieldName
      The field name for the column.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SQLTableModelColumn(String name)
      Creates an instance with the display name and field name the same, canOrder=true and defaultOrder=SortOrder.ASCENDING.
      SQLTableModelColumn(String displayName, String fieldName)
      Creates an instance with canOrder=true and defaultOrder=SortOrder.ASCENDING
      SQLTableModelColumn(String displayName, String fieldName, boolean canOrder, SortOrder defaultOrder)
      Create an instance with the given parameters.

                   boolean canOrder,
                   SortOrder defaultOrder)

        Parameters:
        displayName - The name to display
        fieldName - The actual field name
        canOrder - true if ordering can be done on this column, false otherwise
        defaultOrder - The default ordering.

      • getDefaultOrder

        public SortOrder getDefaultOrder()
        Get the default sort order for the column. Returns SortOrder.NONE if the column may not be sorted, however the getCanOrder() method should be used to make this determination.
        Returns:
        SortOrder.
